features.why_text:
The 100-Year Agenda is not a planner: it’s a lasting record of a life’s journey. It offers a dedicated space to document the milestones that truly matter — family celebrations, professional successes, health tracking, and personal reflections.

Spanning a full century, this agenda helps you step away from the frenzy of the digital present and reconnect with what is essential.
features.design_text: suitable for use in any language
features.pages_text: featuring a clear, minimal calendar and space for notes.

gift.title: The perfect gift
gift.parents_text: To begin documenting a child’s journey months before birth.
gift.graduation_text: A gift that offers long-term perspective.
gift.wedding_text: A diary for two, shared over a lifetime.
gift.you_text: A space to reflect on the past and tell your story.

order_bottom.title: Start Telling Your Story Today
order_bottom.tip_1: Set a reminder to update it regularly (at least once a year).
order_bottom.tip_2: Have a lot to write? Use a companion notebook — and simply note the page number in your agenda.
order_bottom.tip_3: Keep it in a safe place — it’s precious.
order_bottom.tip_4: Share it with friends — they’ll get to know you better.
